sqlMap.select:
select b.DEPTID, hr_getfulldeptname(c.cascadeid) as deptname, a.ryid, a.rybh, a.xm, a.XB, a.CSRQ, a.SFZH, a.HYZK, a.ZGXL, a.JZFS,a.LXSJ,a.JJLXR,a.JJLXRSJ,a.XLXZ, a.SG,a.MZ,a.YWBS,a.TZ,a.CSD,a.ZJXY,a.HKSZD,a.HKXZ,a.LT,a.DQZT,a.LXZD,a.JZMJ,a.XZJ,a.JJLXRZD, b.GHDW, b.PP, b.YDRQ, b.YGXJ, b.GW, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(TO_DAYS(now())-TO_DAYS(a.csrq)),'%Y')+0 as age from lxybmsqb a, bmlxy b, eadept c where a.ryid=b.ryid and b.deptid=c.deptid
a.XM like "%$xm$%"
a.SFZH like "%$sfzh$%"
a.LXSJ like "$lxsj$%"
a.DQZT =#dqzt#

select distinct b.deptid, hr_getfulldeptname(c.cascadeid) as deptname, a.RYID, a.RYBH, a.XM, (select CODEDESC from eacode where field='XB' and code=a.XB) as XB, a.CSRQ,a.SFZH, (select CODEDESC from eacode where field='HYZK' and code=a.HYZK) as HYZK, a.ZGXL, (select CODEDESC from eacode where field='JZFS' and code=a.JZFS) AS JZFS, a.LXSJ,a.JJLXR,a.JJLXRSJ, A.XLXZ, b.YGXJ, a.SG,a.MZ,a.YWBS,a.TZ,a.CSD,a.ZJXY,a.HKSZD, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(TO_DAYS(now())-TO_DAYS(a.csrq)),'%Y')+0 as age,A.HKXZ, a.LT, b.GW, b.GHDW, b.PP, b.YDRQ from lxybmsqb a, bmlxy b, eadept c where a.RYID=b.ryid and b.deptid=c.deptid
a.XM like "%$xm$%"
a.SFZH like "%$sfzh$%"
a.LXSJ like "$lxsj$%"
a.DQZT =#dqzt#

select count(*) as count from lxybmsqb a, bmlxy b where a.ryid=b.ryid
a.XM like "%$xm$%"
a.SFZH like "%$sfzh$%"
a.LXSJ like "$lxsj$%"
a.DQZT =#dqzt#

SELECT b.DEPTID, c.deptname, a.RYID, a.RYBH, a.XM, a.XB,a.CSRQ,a.SFZH,a.HYZK,a.ZGXL, a.JZFS,a.LXSJ,a.JJLXR,a.JJLXRSJ,a.XLXZ, b.YGXJ, b.XJJSRQ, a.SG,a.MZ,a.YWBS,a.TZ,a.CSD,a.ZJXY,a.HKSZD,a.HKXZ,a.LT,a.DQZT,a.LXZD,a.JZMJ,a.XZJ,a.JJLXRZD, b.GHDW, b.PP, b.YDRQ, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(TO_DAYS(now())-TO_DAYS(a.csrq)),'%Y')+0 AS AGE,b.GW FROM lxybmsqb a, bmlxy b, eadept c where a.RYID=b.RYID and b.deptid=c.deptid
a.RYBH like "%$rybh$%"
a.XM like "%$xm$%"
b.GHDW like "%$ghdw$%"
b.PP like "%$pp$%"
c.cascadeid like "$cascadeid$%"
a.SFZH like "%$sfzh$%"
a.LXSJ like "$lxsj$%"
DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(TO_DAYS(now())-TO_DAYS(a.csrq)),'%Y')+0 <=#maxage#
DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(TO_DAYS(now())-TO_DAYS(a.csrq)),'%Y')+0 >=#minage#
b.GW=#gw#
a.DQZT = '$dqzt$'

select distinct b.deptid, hr_getfulldeptname(c.cascadeid) as deptname, a.RYID, a.RYBH, a.XM, (select CODEDESC from eacode where field='XB' and code=a.XB) AS XB, a.CSRQ, a.SFZH, (select CODEDESC from eacode where field='HYZK' and code=a.HYZK) as HYZK, a.ZGXL, (select CODEDESC from eacode where field='JZFS' and code=a.JZFS) as JZFS, a.LXSJ,a.JJLXR,a.JJLXRSJ, (select CODEDESC from eacode where field='XLXZ' and code=a.XLXZ) as XLXZ, (select CODEDESC from eacode where field='YGXJ' and code=b.YGXJ) as YGXJ, b.XJJSRQ, a.SG,a.MZ,a.YWBS,a.TZ,a.CSD,a.ZJXY,a.HKSZD, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(TO_DAYS(now())-TO_DAYS(a.csrq)),'%Y')+0 as age, (select CODEDESC from eacode where field='HKXZ' and code=a.HKXZ) AS HKXZ, a.LT, (select CODEDESC from eacode where field='GW' and code=b.GW) AS GW, b.GHDW, b.PP, b.YDRQ from lxybmsqb a, bmlxy b, eadept c where a.RYID=b.ryid and b.deptid=c.deptid
a.RYBH like "%$rybh$%"
a.XM like "%$xm$%"
b.GHDW like "%$ghdw$%"
b.PP like "%$pp$%"
c.cascadeid like "$cascadeid$%"
a.SFZH like "%$sfzh$%"
a.LXSJ like "$lxsj$%"
DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(TO_DAYS(now())-TO_DAYS(a.csrq)),'%Y')+0 <=#maxage#
DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(TO_DAYS(now())-TO_DAYS(a.csrq)),'%Y')+0 >=#minage#
b.GW=#gw#
a.DQZT = '$dqzt$'

select count(*) as count from lxybmsqb a, bmlxy b, eadept c where a.RYID=b.ryid and b.deptid=c.deptid
a.RYBH like "%$rybh$%"
a.XM like "%$xm$%"
b.GHDW like "%$ghdw$%"
b.PP like "%$pp$%"
c.cascadeid like "$cascadeid$%"
a.SFZH like "%$sfzh$%"
a.LXSJ like "$lxsj$%"
DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(TO_DAYS(now())-TO_DAYS(a.csrq)),'%Y')+0 <=#maxage#
DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(TO_DAYS(now())-TO_DAYS(a.csrq)),'%Y')+0 >=#minage#
b.GW=#gw#
a.DQZT = '$dqzt$'

SELECT count(*) as count FROM lxybmsqb a, bmlxy b, eadept c where a.RYID=b.RYID and b.deptid=c.deptid
a.RYBH like "$rybh$%"
a.XM like "%$xm$%"
b.GHDW like "%$ghdw$%"
b.PP like "%$pp$%"
c.cascadeid like "$cascadeid$%"
a.SFZH like "%$sfzh$%"
a.LXSJ like "$lxsj$%"
DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(TO_DAYS(now())-TO_DAYS(a.csrq)),'%Y')+0 <=#maxage#
DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(TO_DAYS(now())-TO_DAYS(a.csrq)),'%Y')+0 >=#minage#
b.GW=#gw#
a.DQZT = '$dqzt$'
select deptid, cascadeid from eadept where parentid=#deptid# or deptid=#deptid# order by deptid desc

select count(if(a.XB=1, 1, null)) as man, count(if(a.XB=2, 1, null)) as man, count(*) as rycount, count(if(a.HYZK=1, 1, null)) as wh, count(if(a.HYZK=2, 1, null)) as yh, count(if(a.HYZK=3, 1, null)) as ly, count(if(a.HYZK=4, 1, null)) as so, count(if(a.HYZK=5, 1, null)) as qt, count(if(a.HKXZ=1, 1, null)) as ny, count(if(a.HKXZ=2, 1, null)) as fny, count(if(a.XLXZ=1, 1, null)) as tz, count(if(a.XLXZ=2, 1, null)) as zk, count(if(a.XLXZ=3, 1, null)) as qtxl, count(if(b.YGXJ=0, 1, null)) as lxj, count(if(b.YGXJ=1, 1, null)) as yxj, count(if(b.YGXJ=2, 1, null)) as exj, count(if(b.YGXJ=3, 1, null)) as sxj, count(if(b.YGXJ=4, 1, null)) as sixj, count(if(b.YGXJ=5, 1, null)) as wxj, count(if(b.gw=1, 1, null)) as gwlxy, count(if(b.gw=2, 1, null)) as gwdz, count(if(b.gw=3, 1, null)) as gwlscxy, count(if(b.gw=4, 1, null)) as gwxsg, (SELECT DEPTID FROM eadept WHERE DEPTID=#deptid#) AS deptid, (SELECT DEPTNAME FROM eadept WHERE DEPTID=#deptid#) AS deptname from lxybmsqb a, bmlxy b where a.ryid=b.ryid and a.dqzt='2' and b.deptid = #deptid#

select count(if(a.XB=1, 1, null)) as man, count(if(a.XB=2, 1, null)) as women, count(*) as rycount, count(if(a.HYZK=1, 1, null)) as wh, count(if(a.HYZK=2, 1, null)) as yh, count(if(a.HYZK=3, 1, null)) as ly, count(if(a.HYZK=4, 1, null)) as so, count(if(a.HYZK=5, 1, null)) as qt, count(if(a.HKXZ=1, 1, null)) as ny, count(if(a.HKXZ=2, 1, null)) as fny, count(if(a.XLXZ=1, 1, null)) as tz, count(if(a.XLXZ=2, 1, null)) as zk, count(if(a.XLXZ=3, 1, null)) as qtxl, count(if(b.YGXJ=0, 1, null)) as lxj, count(if(b.YGXJ=1, 1, null)) as yxj, count(if(b.YGXJ=2, 1, null)) as exj, count(if(b.YGXJ=3, 1, null)) as sxj, count(if(b.YGXJ=4, 1, null)) as sixj, count(if(b.YGXJ=5, 1, null)) as wxj, count(if(b.gw=1, 1, null)) as gwlxy, count(if(b.gw=2, 1, null)) as gwdz, count(if(b.gw=3, 1, null)) as gwlscxy, count(if(b.gw=4, 1, null)) as gwxsg, (SELECT DEPTID FROM eadept WHERE DEPTID=#deptid#) AS deptid, (SELECT DEPTNAME FROM eadept WHERE DEPTID=#deptid#) AS deptname from lxybmsqb a, bmlxy b, eadept c where a.ryid=b.ryid and a.dqzt='2' and b.deptid=c.deptid and c.cascadeid like '$cascadeid$%'
select leaf from eadept where deptid=#deptid#

select (SELECT DEPTNAME from eadept where DEPTID=b.DEPTID) as deptname ,(select xm from lxybmsqb where ryid=b.ryid) as xm , (select CODEDESC from eacode where field='GW' and code=B.GW) as gw from BMLXY B where b.RYID=#ryid#

select (SELECT DEPTNAME from eadept where DEPTID=b.DEPTID) as deptname1 ,(select xm from lxybmsqb where ryid=b.ryid) as xm1 , (select CODEDESC from eacode where field='GW' and code=b.GW) as gw1 from BMLXY B where b.RYID=#ryid#
